About Me

Let me tell you a few things about me...

BIO

I am a passionate growing Graphics Designer and Web Designer. I am a self-motivated hard-working individual who can communicate with different people at different levels. As a Designer, I would like to increase my skills by utilizing all the necessary tools to make the best in graphics and web design and online marketing. I have some great skils in HTML5, CSS3, Wordpress, Adobe XD, Illustrator and some proficient skills in JavaScript, Angular, Cloud Computing (GCP), Online Marketing and Photoshop.

Graphics Designer

I make beautiful and professional business cards, logos, latter-heads, flyers, invitation cards, calenders and and more.

UI/UX Designer

Creating beautiful interfaces for products that not only look good but are functional. Tackling each project with a user focused mindset. User testing to promote accessibility and a better User Experience.

Web Designer

Taking beautiful designs and building them into responsive and functional websites. Using CMS for easier web maintenance.
